nodes.text: Hindasar was a planet in the Hindasar system of the Expansion Regions' Corpheli sector. After escaping the prison on Delrian, Doctor Cornelius Evazan purchased a forged medical license and established himself as a personal surgeon. Charging exorbitant fees with the promise of droid-free surgery, Evazan scarred hundreds of beings, with several dozen dying of their wounds.
